name: Beer Battered BBQ Cauliflower Wings
description: My Vegan Gluten-free Beer Battered BBQ Cauliflower Wings are perfect for game day but also make for an incredible shared appetizer, side dish or even a fun dinner party menu item.

video.name: VEGAN BBQ CAULIFLOWER WINGS | BEER BATTERED CAULIFLOWER - Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN BBQ CAULIFLOWER WINGS | BEER BATTERED CAULIFLOWER

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/bbq-cauliflower-wings/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

My Vegan Beer Battered BBQ Cauliflower Wings are perfect for game day but also make for an incredible shared appetizer, side dish or even a fun dinner party menu item.

Cauliflower is one of my secret weapons when it comes to making snacks, appetizers, and game day food! There are endless ways to turn it into something addictive and I love how the florets take on a “meat-like” quality when you prepare them in certain ways. I’ve prepared cauliflower in every way imaginable but battered in a beer batter and baked until crisp and golden, then covered in a finger-licking-good spicy bbq sauce might be one of my most favorite ways.

******MORE CAULIFLOWER RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

SPICY CRISPY KUNG PAO CAULIFLOWER: https://www.veganricha.com/kung-pao-cauliflower/

VEGAN SPANISH RICE BOWL WITH TACO SPICE ROASTED CAULIFLOWER: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-spanish-rice-bowl-with-taco-roasted-cauliflower/

SPICY BAKED CAULIFLOWER BITES WITH CELERY RANCH: https://www.veganricha.com/spicy-baked-cauliflower-bites-celery-ranch-vegan-recipe/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#cauliflowerwings #veganappetizer #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons bbq seasoning  (or use 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, and 1/4 teaspoon each of oregano, thyme, and parsley)
1/2 cup of beer or use neutral club soda (or use water )
4 cups cauliflower florets ( or 1 small head of cauliflower chopped into florets)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients and mix well. Then add in the beer and 1 teaspoon oil to make the batter. The batter should be not be too thin. If it is not thick enough, you can add in a teaspoon or more of rice flour.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients and mix well. Then add in the beer and 1 teaspoon oil to make the batter. The batter should be not be too thin. If it is not thick enough, you can add in a teaspoon or more of rice flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the batter is smooth, add in the cauliflower and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the batter is smooth, add in the cauliflower and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the cauliflower is completely coated, transfer it to a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake at 425 degrees Fahrenheit(220c )  for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the cauliflower is completely coated, transfer it to a parchment-lined baking sheet and bake at 425 degrees Fahrenheit(220c )  for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Check at 21 or 22 minutes to see if the cauliflower is done and is tender inside. If it is, then you can remove the cauliflower.
recipeInstructions.name: Check at 21 or 22 minutes to see if the cauliflower is done and is tender inside. If it is, then you can remove the cauliflower.

recipeInstructions.text: Add bbq sauce and hot sauce to a shallow bowl and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add bbq sauce and hot sauce to a shallow bowl and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cauliflower to the bowl where you mixed the bbq sauce and hot sauce and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cauliflower to the bowl where you mixed the bbq sauce and hot sauce and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the cauliflower back onto the baking sheet and bake for another 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the cauliflower back onto the baking sheet and bake for another 5-7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot. Garnish with some green onions and serve with ranch if desired
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot. Garnish with some green onions and serve with ranch if desired

keywords: vegan bbq wings, vegan cauliflower wings, vegan wings
